title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: The U1-MA ("App") is build with your privacy in mind by Dima Koskin ("Developer").

userInfo.title: User Information
items: The app does not collect your data.
With your permission, the app can write your mindful minutes data to the Apple Health.
There is no login required to use the app.
The app does not ask you about your email address, phone number, name, age or gender.
There are no analytics tools used anywhere on the website or in the app.

contacts.content: If you have any questions, please contact the developer by e-mail address u1-ma@dmkskn.com
